      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
             throws NEAlreadyInUserManagerException,
                    NEUserDoesNotExistException
        Adds a User to the user list if it doesnt exist already.
        Parameters:
        user - The User object.
        Throws:
        NEAlreadyInUserManagerException - Thrown if username exists in the list.
        NEUserDoesNotExistException - Thrown if the connection already exists in the list.
